complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into conducting a spacing audit, implementing design tokens, and creating spacing utility classes.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the task into running a contrast analysis, adjusting colors, and updating the design system documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into identifying duplicate code, removing unused components, consolidating functions, optimizing bundle size, and backing up the codebase.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for developing Playwright tests, adding visual regression tests, implementing accessibility tests, conducting performance testing, and documenting test coverage.
